00038 void YukawaFunction::function( MyArray& xs, MyArray& res )
00039 {
00040   for (unsigned long i=0; i<GetDimensionality(); ++i)
00041   {
00042     res[i] = 2.*xs[i]*mu2s[i] / pow( xs[i]*xs[i] + mu2s[i], 2 );
00043   }
00044 }
00045 
00046 void YukawaFunction::NormedIntegralInverse( MyArray& uniforms, MyArray& xs )
00047 {
00048   for (unsigned long i=0; i<GetDimensionality(); ++i)
00049   {
00050     xs[i] = (pow(GetXmin(i),2) + mu2s[i]) * (pow(GetXmax(i),2) + mu2s[i]);
00051     xs[i] /= mu2s[i] + pow(GetXmax(i),2) - (pow(GetXmax(i),2)-pow(GetXmin(i),2))*uniforms[i];
00052     xs[i] -= mu2s[i];
00053     xs[i] = sqrt(xs[i]);
00054   }
00055 }
00056 
00057 void YukawaFunction::SetParams( MyArray& mu2s_ )
00058 {
00059   mu2s = mu2s_;
00060 }

00080 void UniformFunction::function( MyArray& xs, MyArray& res )
00081 {
00082   for (unsigned long i=0; i<GetDimensionality(); ++i)
00083   {
00084     res[i] = 1. / GetRange(i);
00085   }
00086 }

00088 void UniformFunction::NormedIntegralInverse( MyArray& uniforms, MyArray& xs )
00089 {
00090   for (unsigned long i=0; i<GetDimensionality(); ++i)
00091   {
00092     xs[i] = GetXmin(i) + uniforms[i]*GetRange(i);
00093   }
00094 }

00120 void UnitStepFunction::function( MyArray& xs, MyArray& res )
00121 {
00122   for (unsigned long i=0; i<GetDimensionality(); ++i)
00123   {
00124     xs[i] < steps[i]  ? res[i] = 1. / (steps[i]-GetXmin(i))  : res[i] = 0.;
00125   }
00126 }
00127 
00128 void UnitStepFunction::NormedIntegralInverse( MyArray& uniforms, MyArray& xs )
00129 {
00130   for (unsigned long i=0; i<GetDimensionality(); ++i)
00131   {
00132     xs[i] = GetXmin(i) + uniforms[i]*steps[i];
00133   }
00134 }
00135

00137 {
00138   steps = steps_;
00139 }

00156 {
00157   return new ExpDecayFunction( *this );
00158 }
00159 
00160 void ExpDecayFunction::function( MyArray& xs, MyArray& res )
00161 {
00162   res[0] = 1. / lambdas[0] * exp( -((xs[0]-GetXmin(0)) / lambdas[0]) );
00163   for (unsigned long i=1; i<GetDimensionality(); ++i)
00164   {
00165     res[i] = 1. / lambdas[i] * exp( -(xs[i] - xs[i-1]) / lambdas[i] );
00166   }
00167 }
00168 
00169 void ExpDecayFunction::NormedIntegralInverse( MyArray& uniforms, MyArray& xs )
00170 {
00171   for (unsigned long i=0; i<GetDimensionality(); ++i)
00172   {
00173     xs[i] = (1.-uniforms[i])*exp(-GetXmin(i)/lambdas[i]) + uniforms[i]*exp(-GetXmax(i)/lambdas[i]);
00174     xs[i] = -lambdas[i] * log( xs[i] );
00175   }
00176 }
00177 
00178 void ExpDecayFunction::SetParams( MyArray& params_ )
00179 {
00180   lambdas = params_;
00181 }
